name: Night Light (itch)
description:
Night Light was developed by Matt Christian (http://www.submattergames.com) for the #30DayDev game jam. It was created in under 30 days in January 2017 using Unity 5.

You can read all about the development at the developer blog here: https://itch.io/jam/30daydev/topic/55311/project-n...
